Key Match Events: Wilson drove in the tiebreaking run with an infield single down the third-base line
Castellanos hit a two-run home run in the first inning
Several bench players provided game-winning hits in the series
Pre-Game Insights: Several injured regulars were out of the lineup
Manager Kevin Cash apologized to Nick Castellanos for the intentional hit by pitch incident
Post-Match Reflections: Cash expressed respect for MLB's decision to reduce Uceta's suspension
Wheeler praised his team's effort despite not having his best command
Miscellaneous Highlights: Schwarber was scratched due to discomfort in his left elbow
The Phillies completed a three-game sweep
